metadata.title: CVE-2017-7551 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: 389-ds-base version before 1.3.5.19 and 1.3.6.7 are vulnerable to passwordbrute-force attacks during account lockout due to different return codesreturned on password attempts.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
